Package iot.networkentity

Class NetworkEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • iot.networkentity.NetworkEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Gateway, Mote
    public abstract class NetworkEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An abstract class representing an entity active in the LoraWan network
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkEntity

        @Raw
NetworkEntity​(long EUI,
              double xPos,
              double yPos,
              int transmissionPower,
              int SF,
              double transmissionPowerThreshold,
              Environment environment)
        A constructor generating a Network with a given x-position, y-position, spreading factor, transmission power (threshold) and environment.
        Parameters:
        xPos - The x-coordinate of the entity on the map.
        yPos - The y-coordinate of the entity on the map.
        transmissionPower - The transmission power of the entity.
        SF - The spreading factor of the entity.
        transmissionPowerThreshold - The threshold for discriminating different transmissions.
        environment - The environment to which the entity belongs.
